title: Chapter 1 - The Death of a Multi-Millionaire

book.title: Dragon King With Seven Stars
book.description: Upon the death of multi-millionaire playboy Sun Jicheng, Jinan city suddenly becomes the center of a maelstrom of Jianghu intrigue. Once again, the mysterious death and/or disappearance of some of the most powerful and famous martial artists in recent years, such as the “End the Heavens, Destroy the Earth” crime-fighting duo Gao Tianjue and Guo Mie, and the master thief “Laughing General” Li, come to the spotlight. Smack dab in the middle of all the plotting and fighting is Ingot, a scrappy beggar who is far more than what he seems. Translated by Deathblade.
